abstract: A merger between British Airways and Spain’s Iberia looked imminent on Thursday as their boards held separate meetings to discuss a deal to create the world’s third-largest airline by revenue
snippet: A merger between British Airways and Spain’s Iberia looked imminent on Thursday as their boards held separate meetings to discuss a deal to create the world’s third-largest airline by revenue
lead_paragraph: A merger between British Airways and Spain’s Iberia looked imminent on Thursday as their boards held separate meetings to discuss a deal to create the world’s third-largest airline by revenue, Reuters reported.

headline.main: BA, Iberia Boards Meet Over Potential Deal
